涱字的基本解释

涱
zhàng
古同“涨”，水大。

涱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǎng］
［《廣韻》知亮切，去漾，知。］
［《廣韻》陟良切，平陽，知。］
［《集韻》展兩切，上養，知。］
亦作“涱1”。“涨1”的繁体字。
(1)大水貌。
(2)水上升。
(3)指上涨的水流。
(4)增长；积聚。
[②]［zhàng］
亦作“涱2”。“涨2”的繁体字。
(1)弥漫；充满。
(2)因情绪激动致面部充血。
(3)鼓胀；膨胀。
(4)同“脹”。身体内壁受挤迫而产生不舒服的感觉。
[③]［zhāng］
亦作“涱3”。“涨3”的繁体字。
涨海。

涱字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　涱； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页628第03
【集韻】與漲同。

涱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
涱字的起名意思

暂无。

Swift
Basic explanation of words
Swift
zhàng
Gu Tong "rises", the water is big.
Swift
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhǎng］
["Guangyun" knows brightly and cuts, goes to Yang, knows. ]
["Guangyun" Zhiliangqi, Pingyang, Zhi. ]
["Jiyun" shows two cuts, nourishment and knowledge. ]
Also known as "涱1". Traditional Chinese characters for "升1".
(1) The appearance of big water.
(2) Water rises.
(3) Refers to rising water currents.
(4) Growth; accumulation.
[②]［zhàng］
Also known as "涱2". Traditional Chinese characters for "升2".
(1) Diffuse; full.
(2) Facial congestion due to emotional excitement.
(3) Bulging; swelling.
(4) Same as "expansion". The inner wall of the body is squeezed and produces an uncomfortable feeling.
[③]［zhāng］
Also known as "涱3". Traditional Chinese characters for "up 3".
Zhenghai.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　涱; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 628 03
【Jiyun】Same as the rise.
